56707.「あら？ <pc>！\n あなたも アラハギーロに 来ていたの？:
Oh, <pc>! You're here in
Al-Ahagiro, too?

56709.「ええ。<pc>は 勇者の盟友なんです。\n 私と ともに戦ってくれる 大切な人:
That's right. <pc> is the Hero's
Ally. A very important person who fights
beside me.

56710.「なんと！ 勇者の盟友！？: You are the Ally of the Hero?! Truly?!

56711.「……道理で いいはたらきをするはずじゃ。\n <pc>には 何度も世話になって:
I can see why you two work well together.
<pc> has graciously helped me before,
so there's no doubt in my mind!

56712.「して…… <pc>。\n 幻日の鏡の件は どうなった？:
So, <pc>...
What has happened to the Sun Mirror?

56713.ムーニス王に 幻日の鏡を 渡しますか？<yesno><close>: Give King Moonis the Sun Mirror?<yesno><close>

56714.「いやいやいや！ 勇者の盟友ともあろう\n <pc>のことじゃ！\n 本当は な:
No, no, no! This is the Hero's Ally we're
talking about here! You truly know something
about it, don't you?

56715.<pc>は ムーニス王に\n幻日の鏡を 渡した！:
<pc> gave the Sun Mirror to
King Moonis!

56716.「おおっ！ おぬし どこで これを？\n ……なるほど！ 偽りのレンダーシアか。:
Ooh! Where did you find it? ...I see! The
false Lendersia, right? I had no idea it was
there!

56717.「まあ <pc>。\n あなた ムーニス王のお手伝いをしてたのね。\n でも 大:
Well, <pc>... I see you've been
helping King Moonis. But aren't you forgetting
something more important?

56718.「ムーニス王。\n じつは 私たちは 神の緋石を探して\n このアラハギーロ王国:
As a matter of fact, King Moonis... we've come
here to Al-Ahagiro in search of the Divine
Crimsonite.

56719.「ピラミッドには 太陽の石室という聖なる場所が\n あると聞きました。私は そこ:
I heard there's a sacred place in the Pyramid
called the Sun Chamber. I believe that
the Divine Crimsonite is inside.

56720.「うーむ。たしか…… <pc>も\n そのようなことを 言っておったな。:
Hmmm, actually... I think I remember
<pc> mentioning something
like that.

56721.「よしよし！ ふたりの頼みでは 断れん！\n ちょうど行くところじゃったし アン:
Very good! I can't say no to your request!
I was just on my way there, so you two should
come along!

56723.「ムーニス王！ まだ ピラミッドへ\n 出発なさらぬのですか？ いったい\n い:
Your Majesty! You haven't left for the
Pyramid yet? How much time will it take
for you to be ready?!

56724.「むっ！ 今から行こうって\n アンルシア姫と 話しておったんじゃもん！\n こ:
Hmph! I was just talking to Anlucia about
going there, so we're leaving right away!

56725.「お前たちも 来るのじゃ！\n ワシの 護衛をしてたもれ！: You, come with me! You're on guard duty!

56726.「では アンルシア姫。そして <pc>。\n おぬしたちも 気をつけてまいるのじ:
Take care of yourselves out there. I will
meet you at the Pyramid.

56727.「ワシは 先に行って\n 太陽の石室の前で 待っておるからのう！:
I'll be waiting for you outside of the Sun
Chamber!

56728.「そういえば ピラミッドには\n ある特殊な踊りに反応する 仕掛けがあると\n:
I heard that the Pyramid has a mechanism that
responds to a certain special dance.

56729.「じゃあ 私たちも 出発しましょうか。\n ピラミッドの 太陽の石室まで\n で:
We should head out, too. Go to the Sun Chamber
inside of the Pyramid, and make it fast!

56731.「……ここが 太陽の石室？\n 確かに 中に 何かありそうな雰囲気だわ。:
This must be the Sun Chamber... I definitely
sense something inside that room.

56732.「おおっ。待たせてしまったかの？\n すまん すまん。:
Oh, did I keep you waiting?
Sorry, sorry!

56733.「では さっそく 太陽の石室を開くから\n そこで 見ててたもれ！:
I'll go ahead and open the Sun Chamber!
Just sit back and watch!

56734.「我は アラハギーロ王家の血を 引く者！\n この地に眠る 我が祖先たちよ。\n:
The royal blood of Al-Ahagiro flows within me!
To my ancestors who sleep within these
lands... Answer mine call!

56735.「太古より 天照らす 太陽よ！\n 幻日の鏡をもって その光を 石室に捧げん！\:
To the sun that shines from the heavens since
time immemorial! I offer the light of the
Sun Mirror! Show me the way!

56736.「やった！ やった！ 開いたぞよ！\n ピラミッドの財宝を ゲットするぞよ～！:
Yahoo! It's open! Now we can get the treasure
inside!

56738.「どういうことじゃ？\n 石室の中は もぬけの殻ではないか。\n 秘宝は どこに:
What's going on here? The room's empty...?
Where's all the treasure...?

56740.「神の緋石に 近づくんじゃねえ 小娘！: Stay away from that stone, little girl!

56742.「おい お前のことだ！ デコっぱち！！\n 汚ねえ手で オレさまが壊す緋石に\n:
Hey, you! With the forehead! No...FIVE-head!
Don't you dare touch that stone! I'm about
to smash it to pieces!!

56746.「ケケケッ！ オレさまは 妖魔将ゲジュラ！\n そこのヒゲもじゃが オレさまを:
Keheheh! I am General Gejura! I've been
patiently waiting for beardie over there to
bring me to this place!!

56747.「役目とは言え ヒゲもじゃのおっさんに\n ずっと くっついてるのは 大変だった:
It was hard to stay hidden on that old geezer
for as long as I did! I really just wanted to
gobble him up!

56748.「だが ここまで来たからには 今まで\n 我慢してた分も 好きにやらせてもらうぜ:
But now that I'm here, I won't hold anything
back! You'll feel the wrath of my poison!

56749.「……誰も この毒に耐えることは できねえ！\n 骨まで溶かす妖毒で お前を ド:
Not a soul can withstand my poison! It'll turn
you into sludge with even your bones
crying for mercy!!

56751.「<cs_pchero>！ 戻ったのね！\n 今度こそ 神の緋石を守るわよ！！:
<cs_pchero>, you're back!
We have to defend the stone!!

56752.「なかなか しぶてえ デコっぱちだぜ！\n オレさまの毒を喰らっても\n まだ:
You're quite the tough dummy, aren't you?!
Still haven't had your fill of my poison,
have you?!

56753.「……誰も この毒に耐えることは できねえ！\n 骨まで溶かす妖毒で 何度でも:
Not a soul can withstand my poison! It'll turn
you into sludge with even your bones
crying for mercy!!

56754.「ち…ちくしょうっ……\n オレさまの…… 骨まで溶かす 妖毒が……\n ど…ど:
T... this can't be... your bones should've
been turned to sludge... H...how...?

56756.「やったわね <cs_pchero>！\n じゃあ さっそく 神の緋石に\n 勇:
We did it! Let's infuse the Crimsonite right
away!

56757.「……これで ここの神の緋石は\n 神代のチカラを取り戻したわ。\n もう 大魔:
The Divine Crimsonite has regained
its power...not even the Demon Lord
can touch it now.

56758.「輝きを取り戻した 神の緋石とは\n こんなに 美しいものじゃったのか……。:
The Divine Crimsonite shines once again.
How beautiful...

56759.「アンルシア姫よ。ダメもとで聞くが\n この神の緋石は 我が国にあったものじゃし:
Anlucia... I'm going to be blunt and ask
you something. About the stone... would it be
wrong to sell it?

56760.「ダメですよ。\n この神の緋石は 大魔王の侵略を阻み\n レンダーシアを守って:
Yes, extremely. The Divine Crimsonite is
essential to protect Lendersia against the
Demon Lord's invasion.

56761.「アラハギーロ王家には この地にある\n 神の緋石を 守る使命があるのです。\n:
The royal family of Al-Ahagiro has long
protected the Divine Crimsonite in this land.
Please continue to guard it safely.

56762.「……そうか。そんな使命が あるとも知らず\n 秘宝を 売ろうとか考えておったと:
I see... I had no idea that you had such a
mission. And here I was, thinking of selling
it... if only there was a pot to hide in...

56763.「あいわかった！ このピラミッドと太陽の石室\n そして 神の緋石を これまで以:
But, I understand now! I promise to protect
this Pyramid, the Sun Chamber, and the
Divine Crimsonite with all my might!

56764.「それはそれとして…… 結局 民の暮らしを\n 楽にしてやることは できんかった:
Be that as it may... I couldn't make my
people's lives easier after all. What should
I do now...?

56765.「……ここで考えていても 仕方がない。\n アラハギーロへ戻るとするかの。お前た:
There's no point sitting here and doing
nothing, so let's go back to Al-Ahagiro. Sorry
for wasting your time...

56766.「お待ちください ムーニス王。\n こちらに 気になる碑文が……。:
Wait a moment. That inscription on the wall
there...

56768.「我が子孫へ。国貧しく 民飢えし時\n 恵みの果実を育て 糧とせよ。\n 我 神:
"To my descendants. When the country is poor
and the people starving, harvest the Blessed
Fruit beneath the stone to feed them."

56769.「神の緋石の加護あらば\n 太陽の光届かぬ 石室の中にあっても\n 永遠の実り:
"If the Divine Crimsonite is blessed, even
in a chamber where the sun's rays do not
reach, it will bear fruit forever."

56770.「……神の緋石のもとに 恵みの果実！？: Blessed Fruit... under the Divine Crimsonite?!

56771.「こ これは！\n まさか…… シャイニーメロンか！？:
These are... No, it can't be...
Shiny Melons?!

56772.「甘くて たっぷりの汁気と\n 豊富な栄養素を 合わせ持ち…… しかも\n 砂漠:
Sweet, juicy fruits that are rich in nutrients
and easy to grow in a desert climate...
They're miracle fruits!!

56773.「……５００年ほど前に すべて焼失したと\n 聞いておったが まさか こうして\:
I heard that they all burned away about 500
years ago... I had no idea our ancestors left
them behind like this!

56774.「これぞ まさに 砂漠の秘宝！！\n これを育てれば 民の生活も いずれ豊かにな:
This is the true treasure of the desert! If we
grow these, the people's lives will surely
improve and the country restored!!

56775.「アンルシア姫。そして <cs_pchero>。\n 数々のチカラ添え 心から感:
I thank you both from the bottom of my heart
for all your help. It was wonderful seeing the
Hero and her Ally work together!

56776.「……そう言えば <cs_pchero>。\n 幻日の鏡の礼を まだ渡しておらん:
Speaking of which, <cs_pchero>. I didn't
thank you for giving me the Sun Mirror, did
I? Come by the castle later!

56777.「<cs_pchero>。私は この地の\n 神の緋石が チカラを取り戻したこと:
I'll go and report to Lushenda that the Divine
Crimsonite here has regained its power.

56778.「あなたは アラハギーロに戻るんでしょ？\n ムーニス王に よろしく言っておいて:
You're returning to Al-Ahagiro, aren't you?
Please give King Moonis my regards.

79553.「……ずいぶん チカラを失っているみたい。\n 早く 勇者のチカラを 注ぎ込まな:
It's lost a lot of its power. I have to infuse
it with my power right now!

85553.「その踊りのやり方は ピラミッドにある石碑に\n 書かれているとか……。石碑があ:
The instructions for the dance are written
on a stone monument in the Pyramid. If you
find it, you can decipher it with this.

85554.「それでは <pc>どの。\n 毎度のことで 本当に 申し訳ありませんが……\n:
Good luck, <pc>. I'm sorry to
repeat myself, but... please take good care
of King Moonis!

91822.<cs_pchero>が 扉に手をかけると\n何かのスイッチが入り\nどこからと:
As <cs_pchero> placed their hand
on the door, a switch activated and a loud
sound echoed from afar.

91823.「<cs_pchero>。先に 着いていたのね。: Looks like you got here before me.
